articles.title: Kim Jong Un Publishes New Work Calling for Embodying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Publishes New Work Calling for Embodying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism 
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's talk with leading officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea "Let Us Effect Kim Jong Il's Patriotism and Step Up the Building of a Prosperous Country" on July 26, 2012 was made public. 
					 The talk was carried by newspapers on August 3.
					
					 Kim Jong Un in his work said that leader Kim Jong Il was a peerless patriot who performed undying exploits to be recorded in the history of the country for all ages. Kim Jong Il warmly loved the country and the people more than anything else and devoted all his life to the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people, he added. 
					
					 He went on to say:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's long journey of patriotic devotion undergoing arduous ordeals helped face-lift the country and laid the eternal foundation for a thriving nation. 
					
					 His warm love for the socialist motherland and people and self-sacrificing devotion to the prosperity of the country and people's happiness are derived from his absolute trust in his own people and steadfast confidence in justice of the socialist system and victory of socialism. 
					
					 His warm love and devotion are also prompted by his noble awareness and sense of mission that he was responsible for the destiny of the country and people whom President Kim Il Sung entrusted to him. 
					
					 Patriotism that he had displayed is the noblest one which can be called after him only in the light of its essence and its tremendous vitality. 
					
					 This patriotism constitutes the height of socialist patriotism.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's patriotism is the warmest love for our socialist motherland and people and the most energetic and self-sacrificing devotion to the prosperity of the country and people's happiness. It is genuine patriotism as he loved every tree and every blade of grass of the country. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il's patriotism is based on the noble outlook on the country, people and posterity. 
					
					 This patriotism is the precious mental legacy and practical example he left to the Korean people. 
					
					 All the officials, party members and other working people should actively learn from noble patriotism of Kim Jong Il and embody it into practice just as it is. 
					
					 They should faithfully carry forward and complete all the work Kim Jong Il had planned and tried to realize in his lifetime in order to materialize his idea and wishes in this land. 
					
					 The greatest patriotism lies in defending the country. All the people should attach importance to the military affairs, sincerely learn them and devote their patriotism to the sacred war for defending the country if the enemy provokes. 
					
					 Everyone should bravely turn out in the just struggle to achieve national reunification true to the noble patriotic idea of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un in the work set forth the tasks for party and working people's organizations and all the state-run bodies and social organizations to fulfill their responsibility and role in the work for learning from Kim Jong Il's patriotism and embodying it. 
					
					 The country will emerge as a thriving socialist nation when the hot wind of learning from Kim Jong Il's patriotism prevails in the country and all the people fully embody it into practice, he stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Refers to Noble Patriotic Life of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Refers to Noble Patriotic Life of Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un in his work "Let Us Effect Kim Jong Il's Patriotism and Step Up the Building of a Prosperous Country" said leader Kim Jong Il warmly loved the country and the people more than anything else and devoted all his life to the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people.
					 Deeply cherished in Kim Jong Il's mind were the country and people whom he always loved anywhere he went, Kim Jong Un said, and continued:
					
					 Kim Jong Il used to call thick forests and standardized vast fields green mountains and green fields.
					
					 During his visits to foreign countries, he used to call the country and the nation my country and my nation, longing for them.
					
					 Viewing neat villages shrouded in apricot trees and company barracks in persimmon trees, he called them an apricot tree village and a persimmon tree company.
					
					 Since the very day he embarked on the road of the revolution, resolved to be responsible for the Korean revolution, Kim Jong Il had defended and glorified the socialist country all his life. He kept to the road of patriotic dedication to the country and the people till the last moments of his life.
					
					 The struggle to defend the socialist country was the most acute confrontation with imperialist allied forces and the grimmest struggle in history. Kim Jong Il made a long journey of the arduous Songun leadership in the do-or-die spirit to tide over the grim difficulties faced by the country and defended it.
					
					 It was thanks to the wise guidance of Kim Jong Il that our country which had been deprived of its state sovereignty due to weak military muscle a century ago is now demonstrating its might as a world-level military power equipped with tremendous military capabilities.
					
					 It was also thanks to the long journey of patriotic devotion made by Kim Jong Il covering rugged path all his life that the country has been face-lifted and a solid cornerstone for the prosperity of the country laid.
					
					 The land of the country has been rezoned as befitting the socialist country and gravity-fed waterways were built in several regions, turning rural villages into a socialist land of bliss.
					
					 Lots of modern heavy industrial and light industrial factories have been built and the factories that had existed have been renovated as required by the new century and grand edifices for the prosperity of the country and the happiness of posterity have been successfully built across the country.
					
					 The drive for putting industry on a CNC basis that led to Korean-style industrial revolution in the new century proves the high level of Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
					
					 When the country was undergoing difficulties, Kim Jong Il had valuable funds allocated for putting the country's industry on a CNC basis for the future of the prosperous country even though he worried about the people suffering from the shortage of food.
					
					 Nothing is more patriotic than to enlist strength for the prosperity and development of the country. Only when the country is strong, can it defend itself and guarantee the happiness of all the generations to come. Kim Jong Il used to shed tears whenever he heard song "Push Back the Frontiers of Latest Science and Technology" as the song reminded him of the arduous path he had covered and the pains he had taken to put industry on a CNC basis. His tears reflected his genuine patriotism.
					
					 His warm love for the socialist motherland and people and self-sacrificing devotion to the prosperity of the country and people's happiness are derived from his absolute trust in his own people and steadfast confidence in justice of the socialist system and victory of socialism. 
					
					 His warm love and devotion are also prompted by his noble awareness and sense of mission that he is responsible for the destiny of the country and people whom President Kim Il Sung entrusted to him.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Clarifies Essence of Kim Jong Il's Patriotism
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Clarifies Essence of Kim Jong Il's Patriotism
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un clarified the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism in his work "Let Us Effect Kim Jong Il's Patriotism and Step Up the Building of a Prosperous Country".
					 Kim Jong Un said in his work that patriotism which leader Kim Jong Il embodied in practice is the noblest patriotism that can be called after him only in the light of its essence and tremendous vitality.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's patriotism is the culmination of socialist patriotism, Kim Jong Un said, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's patriotism is the warmest love for our socialist motherland and people and the most energetic and self-sacrificing devotion to the prosperity of the country and people's happiness. It is genuine patriotism as he loved every tree and every blade of grass of the country. 
					
					 It is based on a noble outlook on the motherland.
					
					 In his early years Kim Jong Il wrote masterpiece "Embrace of Country" in which he described the embrace of country as warm as the sun as the embrace of President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 He clarified a profound idea that the country means the leader, and the embrace of the country is precisely that of the leader for the Korean people.
					
					 Motherland is not a mere place where one was born and brought up but a place where the people lead a genuine life and their eternal happiness is guaranteed. This is possible when there is a leader.
					
					 That is why devotion to the motherland means loyalty to the leader and loyalty to the leader is the highest revelation of patriotism.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's patriotism is based on a noble outlook on the people.
					
					 Kim Jong Il said the almighty being in the world is not the God but the masses. It is the patriotic creed of Kim Jong Il that the masses build a country.
					
					 Devote everything to realizing what the people desire -- this was his noble will and determination for love for the people.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's patriotism is most vividly reflected in his noble outlook on the younger generation.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's outlook on the younger generation can be clearly found in the slogan "Let Us Live Not Merely for Today But for Tomorrow!" 
					
					 It is his noble will and earnest request that everything should be completed in a perfect way so that the younger generation can benefit from it.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's patriotism is a noble spiritual heritage he handed over to the Korean people and the model of practice.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sets Forth Tasks for Effecting Kim Jong Il's Patriotism
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sets Forth Tasks for Effecting Kim Jong Il's Patriotism 
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un in his work "Let Us Effect Kim Jong Il's Patriotism and Step Up the Building of a Prosperous Country" called on all the officials, party members and other working people to learn from leader Kim Jong Il's noble patriotism and effect it just as it is.
					 Kim Jong Un in the work underlined the need to intensify education to instill Kim Jong Il's patriotism deep into the minds of the people.
					
					 He underscored the need to educate the party members and other working people in Kim Jong Il's patriotism in a principled, deep and broad way so that they can become genuine patriots who devote themselves to the future.
					
					 Education in Kim Jong Il's patriotism should be conducted in a substantial way in combination with practice, he said, and continued:
					
					 Genuine patriots are those who unswervingly follow the path of true patriotism despite difficulties and hardships and those who sincerely and timely carry out revolutionary tasks entrusted to them by the country and the people.
					
					 Education in Kim Jong Il's patriotism should be carried out to suit the specific conditions.
					
					 Patriotism is not an abstract notion. It originates from the yard of one's own home. All the party members and other working people should be educated to become genuine patriots who love their families, spruce up their own hometowns and manage well their work places and devote their sweats and energies to glorifying the country.
					
					 Effecting Kim Jong Il's patriotism means thoroughly carrying out his idea and desire for the prosperity of the country and the happiness of posterity, and conducting all the work for the prosperity of the country the way he did.
					
					 We should faithfully carry forward and complete all the work Kim Jong Il had planned and tried to realize in his lifetime in order to materialize his idea and wishes in this land. 
					
					 The greatest patriotism lies in defending the country. All the people should attach importance to the military affairs, sincerely learn them and devote their patriotism to the sacred war for defending the country if the enemy provokes. 
						
					
					 We should become genuine patriots in the Songun era and build a thriving socialist country to be proud of just as the generation right after the country's liberation built new democratic Korea in hearty response to the call of President Kim Il Sung to display patriotism and just as the heroes in the Chollima era built a land of bliss for the people on the ruins after war.
					
					 The Korean nation has long suffered from unspeakable misfortune and pains after foreign forces divided it into the north and the south. To reunify the country is the supreme task of the nation that brooks no further delay. National reunification precisely means patriotism and national division treachery. Whoever truly loves the country and the nation should valiantly turn out in the just struggle to reunify the country true to Kim Jong Il's noble patriotism whether they are in the north, the south and abroad.
					
					 Kim Jong Un set forth tasks for party organizations, working people's organizations, all national institutions and social bodies to fulfill their responsibilities and roles in the work for learning from and effecting Kim Jong Il's patriotism. He went on:
					
					 Officials should not just sit down and worry over the country but become genuine patriots who uphold the country with total dedication.
					
					 "We serve the country and the people!"-- the slogan put up by the party is a patriotic one which all the officials should hold fast to.
					
					 Officials serving the people should work hard and hard with patriotism so as to make the country prosperous and people lead an affluent life.
					
					 The country will emerge as a thriving socialist nation when the hot wind of learning from Kim Jong Il's patriotism prevails in the country and all the people fully embody it into practice, Kim Jong Un stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Awarded Commemorative Medal of Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Awarded Commemorative Medal of Russia 
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un was awarded a medal commemorating the 25th anniversary of the war veterans committee in the Maritime Territory of Russia.
					 A ceremony of conveying the medal took place in the Maritime Territory on July 26.
					
					 Present there were figures of political parties, social bodies and media in the territory and Vladivostok City and the consul general and staff members of the DPRK consulate general in Nakhodka.
					
					 The chairman of the war veterans committee handed the medal and its diploma to the DPRK consul general.
					
					 The chairman said that the medal reflects the humble wishes of the Russian war veterans for the steady development of the friendship between the two peoples under the leadership of Kim Jong Un. He added that it also reflects the best wishes of the Russian people for the good health of Kim Jong Un, the head of state, for the peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia.
					
					 Then followed congratulatory speeches.

articles.title: Visits
articles.content:
Visits
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- Michael Luther, member of the Federal Parliament from the Christian Democratic Union of Germany, and his party arrived in Pyongyang on Friday.
					 Departing from here on the same day were a delegation of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., the Communist Party of China led by its Head Wang Jiarui and Ricardo Alemao Abreu, international relations secretary of the Central Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party.

articles.title: International Scientific Symposium to Be Held in DPRK
articles.content:
International Scientific Symposium to Be Held in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- An international scientific symposium is to be held under the sponsorship of Kim Il Sung University between August 21 and 22.
					 It will bring together prominent educationists and scientists of famous universities and research institutes of various countries including the DPRK, China, Russia, Germany and Poland.
					
					 The symposium will be held, divided into panels of international political science, economics, science on earth environment, multilingual information processing and medical science.
					
					 More than a hundred valuable scientific papers will be presented there.

articles.title: National University Students Sports Contest Opens
articles.content:
National University Students Sports Contest Opens 
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- A national university students sports contest for September 5 Prize opened with due ceremony at Hamhung Stadium in South Hamgyong Province on August 3.
					 It brought together more than 2 000 players selected from universities and colleges throughout the country. They will compete in the military sports, football, volleyball, table tennis, Korean wrestling and other sports events.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, Jon Kwang Ho, chairman of the People's Committee of the province, officials concerned and university and college students in the province.

articles.title: National August 3 Consumer Goods Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
National August 3 Consumer Goods Exhibition Opens
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The National August 3 Consumer Goods Exhibition was opened with due ceremony at the Central Light Industrial Sample Exhibition on Friday.
					 On display there are at least 126 000 items including garment, foodstuff, household articles, kitchen utensils and sundries for daily use produced at factories and enterprises and by housewives' work-teams, work-teams for production of goods through utilizations of materials available and home workers for welfare service. 
					
					 Products on display draw attention of visitors for quality children's clothes, cotton quilt, handworks, etc. produced with by products and waste materials
					
					  Present at the opening ceremony were officials concerned and producers of those goods from across the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work, Guidelines for Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work, Guidelines for Korea's Reunification
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il made public the work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" on August 4, Juche 86 (1997). 
					 The work serves as important guidelines for all the Korean people in the efforts to preserve and creditably carry forward the idea and exploits of President Kim Il Sung for national reunification.
					
					 In the work Kim Jong Il defined as the Three Charters for National Reunification the Three Principles of National Reunification, the Ten-point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo, which were advanced by Kim Il Sung, and clarified the stand for achieving national reunification on the basis of the charters.
					
					 The idea and theory, contained in the work, touched the heartstrings of all Koreans for its truthfulness and scientific accuracy, displaying great validity in the north-south relations and development of the reunification movement.
					
					 The work led to the adoption of the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, the keynote of which is to achieve reunification by the Korean nation itself.
					
					 But the north-south relations, which were getting momentum in their development, have gone from bad to worse and the nation's reunification movement is now faced with grave challenges due to the separatist forces at home and abroad.
					
					 Opposed to the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 Declaration, the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea disagrees with national cooperation while frantically seeking anti-DPRK confrontation in league with outside forces. This year alone, the group of traitors dared desecrate the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership one after another.
					
					 No matter how desperately it may try, the group can never dampen the desire and will of the entire Korean nation to achieve independent reunification, peace and prosperity by its united efforts in line with the north-south joint declarations.

articles.title: DPRK People Resolve to Follow Kim Jong Il's Patriotism
articles.content:
DPRK People Resolve to Follow Kim Jong Il's Patriotism
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un published the work "Let Us Effect Kim Jong Il's Patriotism and Step Up the Building of a Prosperous Country" on July 26, 2012.
					 The work, released on Friday, calls on the people throughout the country to learn from the noble patriotism displayed by leader Kim Jong Il in building a prosperous country.
					
					 Upon receiving the work, teachers of Kim Il Sung University have hardened their will to devotedly work for the prosperity of the country.
					
					 Dr. and Associate Prof. Kim Chang Hwan, a department head of Kim Il Sung University, told KCNA:
					
					 "The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work instills the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism deep into the minds of the people and inspires them to turn out in the worthwhile patriotic efforts to build a prosperous country.
					
					 The work reminds me of the great life of the peerlessly great man, Kim Jong Il, who loved even a tree and a blade of grass in the country.
					
					 The country has been given a facelift and eternal foundations for building a thriving nation laid, thanks to his warm love for the socialist motherland and people and his self-sacrificing devotion for the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people."
					
					 Candidate Academician, Dr. and Prof. Hwang Sin Ryul said:
					
					 "Patriotism Kim Jong Il had displayed is the noblest one that can be called after him only in the light of its essence and its tremendous vitality, and it constitutes the height of socialist patriotism.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's patriotism was derived from his noble outlook on the country, people and posterity.
					
					 Cherishing deep in our minds Kim Jong Il's patriotism, the precious mental legacy and practical example he left to the Korean people, we will work hard to train more excellent talents faithful to the leadership of respected Marshal Kim Jong Un."
					
					 A teacher, Ri Sun Yong, expressed her will to become a true patriot carrying Kim Jong Il's patriotism into practice, describing the work as a highly important document that formulated patriotism displayed by leader Kim Jong Il all his life

articles.title: Musan Foodstuff Factory Serves Miners
articles.content:
Musan Foodstuff Factory Serves Miners
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The Musan Foodstuff Factory in North Hamgyong Province in the northern part of Korea makes a contribution to the dietary life of workers and their families at the Musan Mining Complex, a leading mineral producer of the country.
					 In this regard, Jo Kil Sun, manager of the factory, told KCNA:
					
					 "A brisk drive is going on in the county to bring a fresh turn in the improvement of the residents' livelihood this year marking the 50th anniversary of the joint meeting of local party and economic officials in Changsong County.
					
					 Our factory with modern production processes turn out 70 odd kinds of foodstuffs, including cake, bread, soda pop, bear, vinegar, corn syrup, distilled spirits, bean milk and noodle.
					
					 The factory provides those foodstuffs to the miners and county households through service networks on a normal basis.
					
					 The quality of our products is not so high at present, but the factory keeps production going on a high level.
					
					 We are also striving to raise the quality of products through technological updating and scientific research."
					
					 According to the manager, foodstuff and essential foodstuff factories in Hoeryong City neighboring the county have also made a big progress in modernization drive. 
					
					 Meanwhile signal achievements are being made at industrial establishments in Myongchon County, which built 200 hectares of raw material base, and other counties and cities of the province.

articles.title: Song "Our Beloved Leader" Encourages DPRK People
articles.content:
Song "Our Beloved Leader" Encourages DPRK People
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- "Our Beloved Leader" has become a favorite song of the people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. 
					 This song vividly reflects the Korean people's absolute trust and profound reverence for the dear respected Kim Jong Un, the feelings that came into their mind through their experience.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, possessed of rare qualification and noble virtues, is the fatherly leader for the DPRK people.
					
					 He attaches top priority to the people's interests, true to the intention of President Kim Il Sung, who regarded it as his maxim to believe in the people as in Heaven, and leader Kim Jong Il, who raised the slogan "We serve the people".
					
					 His fixed stand is that any leader and social system are needed for the popular masses and that they should serve the people only.
					
					 Local people were deeply moved to see him among soldiers of the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army and children of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School in January this year.
					
					 When he gave his field guidance to the Rungna People's Pleasure Park under construction, he, exposed to sandy wind, personally drew a blueprint for facilities to be built at the park. Seeing him on TV, local people were so much touched by his noble virtues.
					
					 The song represents the invincible might of the DPRK in which all the people are united closely around Kim Jong Un in mind.

articles.title: Consumer Goods Popular among Local People
articles.content:
Consumer Goods Popular among Local People
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The National August 3 Consumer Goods Exhibition was opened in Pyongyang on Friday.
					 On display there are at least 126 000 items of goods, including garment, footwear, foodstuff, household articles, kitchen utensils and sundries for daily use, which were produced at industrial establishments, housewives' workteams and reutilization production workteams and by home workers for welfare service across the country.
					
					 Exhibits presented by consumer goods production units in Pyongyang and other parts of the country have become the focus of attention for their diversity, necessity and utility.
					
					 Ko In Sil, a department director of the Ministry of Foodstuff and Daily Necessities, told KCNA:
					
					 "The ongoing exhibition witnesses an increase of varieties of exhibits nearly 2.4 times the figures in the previous year.
					
					 The credit for those achievements goes to the meticulous guidance of leader Kim Jong Il, who had worked heart and soul for the improvement of people's livelihood in his lifetime.
					
					 As was busy with his guidance over the Songun revolution, he indicated the tasks and ways for all economic units to step up the August 3 Consumer Goods Production Movement and took concrete measures to this end.
					
					 True to his noble intention, all the units have striven to turn out more consumer goods that meet the tastes and demands of people, by exploiting locally available raw materials, agricultural by-products and internal reserves this year."
					
					 Every economic unit of the country is now working hard to radically raise the quality and variety of consumer goods.
					
					 In Pyongyang, Phyongchon, Taedonggang and Mangyongdae districts provide residents with quilts, pillows, various jars, vessels, bags and household articles urgently needed for living.
					
					 Garments, grassworks and household goods are mass-produced in North and South Phyongan and Hamgyong provinces and South Hwanghae Province.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. Kingpin of Int'l Plots, Terrorism
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. Kingpin of Int'l Plots, Terrorism 
						
Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The recent testimony made by a criminal who infiltrated into the DPRK in an attempt to demolish statues and grand monuments, most sacred treasures in the country, brought to light the truth that the U.S. was deeply involved in the hideous operations of the south Korean puppet regime to be conducted by defectors to south Korea.
					Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in a bylined article in this regard: 
					
					This proves once again that the U.S. is, indeed, a kingpin of international plot-breeding operations and terrorism. 
					
					Citing facts to prove that the keynote of the foreign policy pursued by the U.S. is to carry out the most outrageous and gruesome terrorism, the article continues:
					
					The U.S. imperialists have left no means untried to stifle the DPRK but they proved futile. That is why they are resorting to such plots to commit hideous terrorism.
					
					Standing in the van of such terrorist operations is the "National Foundation for Democracy", an American non-governmental organization. This organization is deeply involved in subversive and sabotage activities for isolating and stifling the DPRK.
					
					It was none other than this organization which often held hearings on the "issue of defectors to south Korea from the north," etc. and prodded NGOs and lawmakers in south Korea, Japan and Europe into the anti-DPRK offensive to knock into shape a relevant international solidarity organization. It was again this conspiratorial body that formed the "Alliance for North Korean Freedom" and worked hard to muscle it through U.S. Congress.
					
					The U.S. has escalated its psychological warfare and destabilizing operations against the DPRK, providing a fabulous amount of funds to the anti-DPRK conspiratorial bodies as a special allocation from its annual state budget. It is the U.S strategic scenario to destabilize the Korean public mindset and do harm to their single-minded unity and finally bring down the social system in the DPRK through its hideous terrorism. 
					
					The U.S. imperialists would be well advised to coolly face up to the situation and immediately stop their reckless terrorism against the DPRK.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korea Urged to Behave Themselves
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korea Urged to Behave Themselves
Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The recent statements issued by a spokesman for the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea respectively declared before the world that the DPRK would wipe out by dint of Songun the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea that dare hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership, social system and people of the DPRK.
					Rodong Sinmun Friday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					This represents the towering resentment of the DPRK army and people and their will to take revenge upon the enemies. The recent action taken by the DPRK is an entirely legitimate measure in the light of DPRK law and international law on human rights and counter-terrorism. 
					
					The operations to lure and abduct residents of the DPRK and hideous politically-motivated terrorism are organized and premeditated crimes of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime, to all intents and purposes. 
					
					The anti-DPRK plots being hatched by them, talking about "defectors to the south" and "human rights performance in the north," are a revelation of their sinister scenario to break its single-minded unity and bring down its social system, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					Now that it is clear the U.S. is the base of state-sponsored politically-motivated terrorism against the DPRK and the Lee regime is its executor, it is quite natural for the DPRK army and people to take the toughest counter-action to eliminate the root cause of terrorism.
					
					The DPRK army and people can never remain passive onlookers to this grave situation where the U.S. and the Lee regime persist in their operations to lure and abduct its residents and even resort to such gruesome terrorism intended to hurt the dignity of its supreme leadership in wanton violation of international law. There would be no one in the world who would show leniency towards a robber trying to kill one with a dagger. The DPRK's practical strong physical retaliatory offensive admits of no argument as it is an exercise of the right to self-defence. Criminals should own responsibility for their crimes.
					
					The U.S. and the Lee regime had better behave themselves, pondering over the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by their anti-DPRK criminal operations and subversive and sabotage activities and the ensuing miserable fate.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Regime Accused of Trying to Evade Its Responsibility for Attempted Terrorism
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Regime Accused of Trying to Evade Its Responsibility for Attempted Terrorism
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- Of late, the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea is claiming that it has nothing to do with the recent politically-motivated attempted terrorism, letting defectors to south Korea and conservative media paint Jon Yong Chol as an "impostor" who stoops to any infamy to make money.
					 The regime went the lengths of spreading a story that the recent case was a "farce" orchestrated by the north.
					
					 Minju Joson on Friday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The regime's claim is a whopping lie.
					
					 Anti-DPRK plot-breeding bodies such as the "Front for Liberation of North Koreans" and "Society for Demolition of Statues" are being funded by the U.S. and the Lee regime.
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that members of the society who defected to the south after committing crimes against the country and the nation openly said they would get hundreds of millions of won for blowing up statues in the north.
					
					 What is more intolerable is that the Lee regime is describing the recent case as a "farce" orchestrated by the north.
					
					 It is leaving no means untried to evade the responsibility for the attempted terrorism but in vain.
					
					 If the regime persists in its reckless terrorism, it will not be able to escape a merciless punishment by the enraged army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Once the DPRK is determined to do something, it puts it into practice without conditions. This is well known to the world.
					
					 If something happens between the north and the south in the future, the blame for this will entirely rest with the Lee regime. This is renewed warning to it.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Denounces Japan's Moves to Become Military Giant
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Denounces Japan's Moves to Become Military Giant 
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- Kyunghyang Daily News of south Korea in an editorial on August 1 denounced the Japanese authorities' moves to become a military power.
					 The defence white paper published by Japan on July 31 clearly testifies to its stand to turn the country into a military giant, the editorial said, and went on:
					
					 Japan has annually spent defence budget to the tune of tens of billions of U.S. dollars in recent years, putting spurs to bolstering its military muscle.
					
					 Japan, a war criminal state that provoked the Pacific war in the last century, has gone intent on increasing the military capabilities without any sincere apology for its past history. This poses another threat to neighboring countries.
					
					 In this year's defence white paper, too, Japan repeated stereo-typed nonsense that Tok Islets belong to it.
					
					 This being a hard fact, Lee Myung Bak regime is trying to conclude a military agreement while calling for future-oriented military cooperation with Japan.
					
					 Japan can never be a party for cooperation as it has not yet opted to settle the issues of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and the forcible drafting of Koreans while laying "territorial claim to Tok Islets".

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Pro-Reunification Patriotic Figures under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Pro-Reunification Patriotic Figures under Fire
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) held a rally before a detention house in Seoul on July 31 in protest against the south Korean authorities' indiscriminate suppression of pro-reunification patriotic figures.
					 Speakers at the rally accused the authorities of disallowing even meeting with Vice-Chairman Ro Su Hui and Secretary General Won Jin Uk of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon.
					
					 They demanded the authorities halt the suppression of those patriotic figures who carried on activities to defuse the tension between the south and the north and the danger of war and achieve peaceful reunification of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Then a statement was read out.
					
					 It accused the Lee Myung Bak "government" of savagely violating the rights of reunification champions after indiscriminately putting them in custody on charges of being "Reds" and "persons following the north." 
					
					 Recalling that ailing Won staged a sit-in hunger strike in protest against the authorities' suppression, the statement called on all forces of conscience to stage actions for the release of Ro and Won.

articles.title: War Victory Day Observed by Internet Paper in U.S.
articles.content:
War Victory Day Observed by Internet Paper in U.S. 
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- Ro Kil Nam, representative of an Internet paper of Koreans in the U.S. "Minjok Thongsin", released an article on the 59th anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The article said:
					
					 It is known to world people that the Korean War was ignited by the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists have committed all sorts of crimes in south Korea since they divided the Korean nation into two parts.
					
					 The south Korea-U.S. joint military exercises targeted against the north are being staged in south Korea without let-up and the U.S. hurled even Japan into those drills for war of aggression.
					
					 The U.S. has wantonly violated the Armistice Agreement (AA). It listed the north as part of an "axis of evil," escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK has worked hard for achieving peaceful reunification by sticking to the three principles of national reunification --independence, peaceful reunification and the great unity of the nation, and its foreign policy of independence, friendship and peace.
					
					 It is thanks to the might of single-minded unity of the army and people of the DPRK around their leader that it has demonstrated its might as a politico-ideological and military power.
					
					 The article called for an earliest possible replacement of AA by a peace-keeping regime and the pullback of the U.S. forces from south Korea.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Regime's Attempted Terrorism against DPRK under Fire in Nigeria
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Regime's Attempted Terrorism against DPRK under Fire in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- M. M. Alhassan, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, made public a statement on July 24 denouncing the U.S. and the south Korean regime's attempted terrorism against the DPRK.
					 He said in his statement the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet regime hatched plots to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, adding that this is touching off hatred not only among the Korean people but among the Juche idea followers in the world. 
					
					 We vehemently condemn the south Korean puppet regime for its attempted hideous subversive activities and sabotages in collusion with the U.S. master, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 This year the south Korean regime committed provocations of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK not a few times. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean regime have made desperate efforts to impair the prestige of the peerlessly great men always remembered by the Korean people and the world progressives, but in vain. 
					
					 They are the sworn enemy of mankind as they are working hard to bring down socialism in the DPRK at any cost. The south Korean puppet forces are a group of unethical and wicked traitors with whom the Korean nation can never live under the same sky. 
					
					 It is none other than the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors that is keen to bring down the dignified social system in the DPRK after driving the inter-Korean relations into a total collapse through its worst policy of confrontation. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK rallied close behind the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un remain unshakable and will enjoy invariable support from the Juche idea followers.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Human Rights Abuses under Fire in Brazil
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Human Rights Abuses under Fire in Brazil
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- Jose Gil de Almeida, chairman of the Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK, on July 25 made public a statement in denunciation of the south Korean puppet regime's serious human rights abuses. 
					 Recalling that Pak Jong Suk had a press conference with Korean and foreign reporters upon coming back to the DPRK, disillusioned with south Korea to which she had been taken away, the statement referred to what she said about the human rights abuses committed  by south Korean agents. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 All Koreans and fair-minded people of the world and prominent Red Cross figures are expressing irrepressible anger at the human rights abuses of the Lee Myung Bak regime and brand this as terrorism against human rights, slave trade of modern version and piracy of the 21st century. 
					
					 Rare to be found in this world are such monstrous crimes as abduction of people and human rights abuses. 
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of gangsters bribe agents and prod them into operations to lure and abduct those who betrayed their country after failing to overcome temporary difficulties and other residents of the DPRK who went to neighboring countries to meet their relatives or on business and take them to south Korea for using them for politically-motivated provocations against the DPRK. 
					
					 This is an infringement upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and a grave provocation against it. 
					
					 The Korean people will never pardon the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for committing ceaseless criminal acts against the DPRK in total denial of the June 15 North-South joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korea Urged to Drop Policy Hostile to DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korea Urged to Drop Policy Hostile to DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The Working Citizens' Association of Democratic Congo on July 25 made public a statement denouncing the U.S. and the south Korean regime for attempting terrorism against the DPRK. 
					 The statement said: The U.S. and the south Korean group of traitors have perpetrated ceaseless acts of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK. Not content with this, they made no scruple of conducting a despicable operation to infiltrate defectors to south Korea into the DPRK to demolish statues and grand monuments, treasures of the Korean people. 
					
					 This was prompted by their foolish scenario to destabilize people's mind-set and bring down socialist Korea at any cost, it said, and went on:
					
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula remains so tense that a war may break out any moment. 
					
					 The reckless moves of the U.S. and south Korea to start a war will only touch off worldwide bitterer curse and condemnation. 
					
					 The association bitterly denounces the U.S. and south Korea's hideous criminal acts to stifle the DPRK. 
					
					 We strongly demand the U.S. and south Korea drop at once their hostile policy toward the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website of Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website of Nigerian Organization
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea on July 24 posted on its website the full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification".
					 The work, made public on August 4, 1997, clarifies the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung for national reunification and formulates the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme for great national unity and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification.
					
					 It also indicates tasks and ways for accomplishing the cause of national reunification on the basis of the charters.

articles.title: Events Held in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Events Held in Foreign Countries
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries to congratulate the dear respected Kim Jong Un on receiving the title of DPRK Marshal and observe the 15th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" and the day of victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 They included meetings, lectures and film shows in Democratic Congo, Germany, France and Indonesia between July 25 and 27.
					
					 The deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Democratic Congo who is chairman of the Democratic Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association, addressing a meeting, said by awarding the title of DPRK Marshal to Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un the Korean people demonstrated once again the might of single-minded unity behind him before the whole world.
					
					 On July 27, 1953 is the significant day when the Korean people defeated the U.S. imperialists under the wise leadership of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, the deputy general secretary noted, adding:
					
					 Under the wise leadership of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, the DPRK turned into a nuclear weapons state which the U.S. and other imperialists dare not provoke.
					
					 The undying feats performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for the Korean revolution and the world revolution are shining more brilliantly thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un. The DPRK has a bright and rosy future as it is led by Kim Jong Un and the human cause of independence is sure to be accomplished.
					
					 The chairman of the Nider Sachsen State Committee of the Communist Party of Germany and other speakers said at the meetings it is great honor and pleasure not only for the Korean people but for the world progressives that the title of DPRK Marshal was conferred upon Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The vice-president of the France-Korea Friendship Association said in a lecture that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il were great patriots and the lodestar of national reunification.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at a meeting in Germany.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised in Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association released its bulletin No. 6 on July 26 to mark the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary  leadership. 
					 The bulletin carried several articles with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 In the article titled "Songun leadership" it said it was an event of great significance that Kim Jong Il started his Songun leadership by visiting Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105th  Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, 1960. 
					
					 Socialist Korea has always advanced along the road of victory under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il, it added.
					
					 The article titled "Idea of by Korean nation itself and Kim Jong Il" dealt with the feats Kim Jong Il performed for national reunification by making sure that the idea of "by the Korean nation itself" serves as a foundation and core for the development of inter-Korean relations, regarding it as an invariable principle to solve all issues by the concerted efforts of all people from an independent stand.
					
					 The bulletin in the articles captioned "Kim Jong Un, focus of world attention" and "Conferment of Title of DPRK Marshal upon leader Kim Jong Un" praised his greatness and underscored the historic significance of the awarding of the title.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked in Peru
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked in Peru
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea made public a statement on July 26 to mark the 15th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification".
					 The statement said the work is a great programme giving bright prospect to the world progressives supporting the Korean people struggling for the reunification of the country. 
					
					 No desperate moves of the U.S. imperialists and Lee Myung Bak puppet regime of south Korea can ever quell the desire of the Korean people to achieve reconciliation and unity and found the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo in the spirit of "By our nation itself" true to the great programme for reunification, the statement said, and went on: 
					
					 The Korean people will surely emerge victorious in the struggle for the reunification of the country as Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Marshal Kim Jong Un is successfully carrying forward the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The committee together with the Peruvian progressives extends invariable support and solidarity to the struggle of the government of the DPRK and its people for the reunification of the country.

articles.title: DPRK War Victory Day Marked in Peru
articles.content:
DPRK War Victory Day Marked in Peru 
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism released a special issue of its bulletin on July 23 to mark the 59th anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 It carried an article with a picture of President Kim Il Sung waving back to the ranks of military paraders. 
					
					 The article said that the Korean people boundlessly revere Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, an iron-willed commander who defeated two imperialisms in one generation and paragon of the anti-imperialist struggle, and Generalissimo Kim Jong Il who protected socialism and sovereignty of the country with his unique Songun politics. 
					
					 We warmly congratulate the army and people of the DPRK greeting the 59th war victory day, the article noted, adding:
					
					 We firmly believe that the Korean people will win victory after victory in the struggle for socialism and national reunification and implementing the cause of independence against imperialism holding aloft the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, who is successfully carrying forward the Juche cause, Songun cause.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un publica nueva obra sobre el patriotismo de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un publica nueva obra sobre el patriotismo de Kim Jong Il
						
Pyongyang, 3 de agosto (ACNC) -- Quedo publicada la nueva obra del Maximo Dirigente     Kim Jong Un "Aceleremos la construccion de una patria prospera materializando el patriotismo de           Kim Jong Il", charla sostenida el 26 de julio de 2012 con los cuadros del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					La obra quedo insertada en los periodicos de este jueves.
					
					  La obra senala que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il fue patriota sin igual que amo mas calidamente que nadie la patria y el pueblo y dedico su vida entera por la prosperidad de la patria y la felicidad del pueblo realizando asi imborrables hazanas que brillaran eternamente en los anales de la patria.
					
					  El largo camino de direccion en el terreno recorrido por el en toda su vida superando todas las pruebas con abnegacion patriotica, fue el factor que transformo el perfil de nuestra patria y sento la piedra angular de construccion de una patria prospera, apunta.
					
					  El amor ferviente del Dirigente por la patria socialista y el pueblo y su abnegacion por la prosperidad de la patria y la felicidad del pueblo partieron de la confianza absoluta en su pueblo, la justeza del regimen socialista y la victoria de la causa socialista, aclara.
					
					  Igualmente, -prosigue- partieron de la noble conciencia y obligacion de responsabilizarse por el destino de la patria, legada por el Presidente      Kim Il Sung, y del pueblo que le encomendo este.
					
					  El patriotismo, que encarnaba y ponia en practica el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, es el mas noble que puede ser denominado solo con su nombre tanto en su contenido esencial como en vista de su gran vitalidad, afirma.
					
					  El patriotismo de Kim Jong Il es la cima del patriotismo socialista y se expresa en el amor mas calido por nuestra patria socialista y nuestro pueblo y en el sacrificio por la prosperidad de la patria socialista y la felicidad del pueblo, acota la obra.
					
					  Anade que es el patriotismo genuino que aprecia cada planta y cada arbol de la patria y los protege con sangre.
					
					  Se basa en la noble concepcion de la patria, el pueblo y las futuras generaciones, explica.
					
					  Es la noble herencia espiritual y ejemplo de accion dejados por el Dirigente a nuestro pueblo, senala.
					
					  Todos nuestros funcionarios, militantes del partido y trabajadores deben aprender con afan el noble patriotismo del Dirigente y materializarlo en sus actividades sin anadidura ni resta, indica.
					
					   Prosigue que al continuar con fidelidad y completar los proyectos ideados e impulsados en la practica por el Dirigente en su vida, deben hacer realidad en el territorio patrio sus ideales y deseos.
					
					  La maxima muestra de patriotismo esta en la defensa de la patria. Todo el pueblo debe dar importancia a los asuntos militares y aprenderlos con sinceridad e incorporarse con patriotismo y fidelidad a la sagrada defensa de la patria si acometen los enemigos, subraya.
					
					  En acato al noble ideal del Dirigente Kim Jong Il de amar la patria y la nacion, todos deben sumarse a la justa lucha por reunificar la patria, exhorta.
					
					  En la parte final de su obra, el Maximo Dirigente enumero las tareas necesarias a que las organizaciones del partido y las entidades de masas, todos los organos estatales y sociales cumplan con su responsabilidad y papel en las labores para aprender el patriotismo de Kim Jong Il y materializarlo.
					
					  Cuando se levante en todo el pais la ola del patriotismo de Kim Jong Il y todo el pueblo lo implemente en sus actividades, nuestra patria emergera como Estado socialista prospero y poderoso, concluyo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe a la delegacion del partido chino
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe a la delegacion del partido chino
						
Pyongyang, 3 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional  de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio el dia 2 a la delegacion del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China, de visita en Corea.
					En la ocasion participaron los miembros de la delegacion china encabezada por el jefe de ese departamento, Wang Jiarui, y el embajador chino en Corea Liu Hongcai.
					
					Estuvieron presentes tambien Kang Sok Ju, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y vicepremier, Kim Yang Gon, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del CC del PTC, y Kim Song Nam, subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC.
					
					 Wang Jiarui transmitio a Kim Jong Un el saludo de parte del colectivo de direccion central del PCCh, incluso el Secretario General Hu Jintao.
					
					Tras rendir homenaje a la memoria del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, intimo amigo y maestro del pueblo chino, el visitante subrayo que el realizo enorme aporte a la revolucion coreana y al desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad China-Corea.
					
					Dijo que el partido y el pueblo chinos estan complacidos de todo corazon de los nuevos y grandes exitos que logra el pueblo coreano en la construccion socialista bajo la direccion del Primer Secretario Kim Jong Un.
					
					Destaco que fortalecer y consolidar las tradicionales relaciones de amistad entre ambos paises, preparadas por los lideres de la vieja generacion de los dos partidos y dos paises constituyen la inconmovible orientacion del partido y el gobierno de China y expreso la conviccion de que la amistad China-Corea se desarrollara mas y dara frutos mas ricos.
					
					Kim Jong Un expreso agradecimiento al respecto, mando un saludo al colectivo de direccion central del PCCh, inclusive el Secretario General Hu Jintao, y sostuvo conversaciones con Wang Jiarui en un clima cordial y amistoso.
					
					El recibio presente preparado por la delegacion china y ofrecio una cena en honor de los huespedes.
					
					A la recepcion fueron invitados los miembros de la delegacion y Liu Hongcai.
					
					Ademas, estuvieron presentes Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Jang Song Thaek, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN, Kang Sok Ju, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y vicepremier, Kim Yong Il, Kim Yang Gon y Mun Kyong Dok, miembros suplentes del Buro Politico y secretarios del CC del PTC, y Kim Pyong Ho, Kim Song Nam y Ri Su Yong, subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC.
					
					El banquete transcurrio en un ambiente ameno.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un condecorado con medalla conmemorativa de Rusia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un condecorado con medalla conmemorativa de Rusia
						
Pyongyang, 3 de agosto (ACNC) -- Al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un fue otorgada la medalla conmemorativa del 25o aniversario de la fundacion del comite de veteranos de guerra en el territorio litoral de Rusia.
					  La ceremonia de entrega de la medalla se efectuo el dia 26 de julio en el territorio litoral de Rusia.
					
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes las personalidades de los partidos politicos, las entidades sociales y las instituciones de prensa en el territorio litoral y la ciudad de Vladivostok y el consul general y otros miembros del consulado general de Corea en Najodka.
					
					  El presidente de dicho comite entrego la medalla y diploma al consul general coreano.
					
					  El dijo que en esta medalla estan reflejados el modesto deseo de los veteranos rusos sobre el desarrollo continuo de la amistad combativa entre los pueblos de dos paises bajo la direccion de     Kim Jong Un y la devocion del pueblo ruso que desea al joven jefe de Estado buena salud para la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y el Nordeste Asiatico.
					
					  A continuacion, hubo discursos de felicitacion.

articles.title: Inaugurada Exposicion Permanente Estatal de Regalos
articles.content:
Inaugurada Exposicion Permanente Estatal de Regalos
						
Pyongyang, 3 de agosto (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurada la Exposicion Permanente Estatal de Regalos, construida al pie del pintoresco monte Ryong-ak como testigo de gran veneracion y devocion de todos los coreanos hacia los grandes hombres sin pares del monte Paektu.
					La exposicion tiene la sala de panorama general donde estan erigidas las estatuas de pie del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en amplia sonrisa.
					
					Alli estan exhibidos por orden cronologico y por zonas y segmentos sociales los valiosos presentes dedicados a los grandes hombres por los militares y civiles de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, los compatriotas residentes en ultramar como los de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon) y los habitantes de diversos estratos del Sur de Corea.
					
					Los grandes hombres concedieron los regalos recibidos para hacerlos patrimonios comunes de la nacion coreana y ponerlos al disfrute del pueblo.
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia primero la ceremonia de inauguracion.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Choe Yong Rim, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, los funcionarios de instituciones del Partido y el Poder, ministerios, organos centrales y unidades vinculadas, los constructores militares y trabajadores capitalinos, etc.
					
					Choe Yong Rim, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y primer ministro, transmitio el mensaje de felicitacion del CC del PTC enviado a los constructores militares, funcionarios, miembros de brigada de construccion y voluntarios que realizaron brillantes meritos en la construccion de la exposicion permanente.
					
					Segun el mensaje, con motivo del centenario del nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung, quedo inaugurada la exposicion que servira de base de educacion encargada de transmitir a las generaciones venideras las imperecederas proezas y las nobles personalidades de los grandes hombres del monte Paektu respetados ilimitadamente por toda la nacion.
					
					El CC del PTC aprecia altamente el hecho de que los participantes en la obra hayan construido otro magnifico establecimiento de alabanza a los grandes hombres del monte Paektu, senalo el mensaje.
					
					Al pronunciar la palabra de inauguracion, Choe Thae Bok, miembro del BP y secretario del CC del PTC, destaco la necesidad de enaltecer como eternos lideres del PTC y la revolucion coreana al camarada Kim Il Sung y al camarada Kim Jong Il, glorificar siempre la vida revolucionaria y hazanas de ellos y acatar con fidelidad la idea y guia del Partido siendo verdaderos companeros de armas de la revolucion del Songun que defienden a costa de la vida al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					
					Seguidamente, hubo discursos.
